00016 #include "TTBuffer.h"
00017 #include <TTEScheduler.h>
00018 #include <TTBufferEmpty_m.h>
00019 #include "TTEApplicationBase.h"
00020 
00021 using namespace TTEthernetModel;
00022 
00023 Define_Module( TTBuffer);
00024 
00025 TTBuffer::TTBuffer()
00026 {
00027     actionTimeEvent = new SchedulerActionTimeEvent("TTBuffer Scheduler Event", ACTION_TIME_EVENT);
00028 }
00029 
00030 TTBuffer::~TTBuffer()
00031 {
00032     cancelEvent(actionTimeEvent);
00033     delete actionTimeEvent;
00034 }
00035 
00036 void TTBuffer::initialize()
00037 {
00038     Buffer::initialize();
00039     ev << "Initialize TTBuffer" << endl;
00040 
00041     //Register Event
00042     TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00043     actionTimeEvent->setDestinationGate(gate("schedulerIn"));
00044     tteScheduler->registerEvent(actionTimeEvent);
00045 
00046     setIsEmpty(true);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void TTBuffer::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00050 {
00051     bool arrivedOnSchedulerIn = msg->arrivedOn("schedulerIn");
00052 
00053     Buffer::handleMessage(msg);
00054 
00055     if (arrivedOnSchedulerIn && msg->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT)
00056     {
00057         cMessage *outgoingMessage = dequeue();
00058         //Send Message
00059         for (std::list<cGate*>::iterator gate = destinationGates.begin(); gate != destinationGates.end(); ++gate)
00060         {
00061             if (outgoingMessage)
00062             {
00063                 sendDirect(outgoingMessage->dup(), *gate);
00064             }
00065             else
00066             {
00067                 sendDirect(new TTBufferEmpty("TT Buffer Empty"), *gate);
00068             }
00069         }
00070         if(gate("out")->isConnected()){
00071             if (outgoingMessage){
00072                 send(outgoingMessage->dup(),"out");
00073             }
00074             else{
00075                 send(new TTBufferEmpty("TT Buffer Empty"),"out");
00076             }
00077         }
00078         if (outgoingMessage)
00079         {
00080             recordPacketSent();
00081             delete outgoingMessage;
00082 
00083             // Now execute transmit callbacks if there are some
00084             for(std::map<TTEApplicationBase*,Callback*>::const_iterator iter = transmitCallbacks.begin();
00085                     iter != transmitCallbacks.end(); ++iter){
00086                 iter->first->executeCallback(iter->second);
00087             }
00088         }
00089         //Reregister scheduler
00090         TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00091         tteScheduler->registerEvent((SchedulerEvent *) msg);
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 void TTBuffer::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00096     Buffer::handleParameterChange(parname);
00097 
00098     if(actionTimeEvent)
00099         actionTimeEvent->setAction_time(par("sendWindowStart").doubleValue());
00100 }
